text: Hans Persson, born 18 January 1959, is a Swedish former cross-country skier, specialized at long-distance races. In 1984, he won Vasaloppet. Representing at Åsarna IK, he won the Swedish national relay championship with that club in 1980-1983 and again in 1988. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male cross-country skiers Category:Vasaloppet winners Category:Åsarna IK skiers
title: Hans Persson
